What’s Changed

Summary

Summary of changes in the Alias Python API version 7.0.0.

New

Python bindings to Alias C++ API

add_async_task

Schedule a function as a task to be executed by Alias asynchronously.

Added members

  • AlStoreOptions.jt_atf.store_want_subnode

Removed members

  • AlStoreOptions.jt_atf.store_want_xtbrep
